synopsis.text:
There's a new craze sweeping through the prestigious Seiga Academy: Phantasy Star Online 2 (PSO2), the latest online gaming sensation. Yet, amidst the sea of enthusiastic gamers, Itsuki Tachibana remains an anomaly. He's not into video games, but he excels in other areas, boasting impressive grades, perfect attendance, and a knack for filling in for any after-school club.

Itsuki's versatile skills catch the eye of Rina Izumi, the epitome of perfection and the student council president. She's beautiful, popular, athletic, and academically gifted, but she's struggling to monitor the students' extracurricular activities, particularly their growing obsession with PSO2.

In a surprising turn of events, Rina handpicks Itsuki as the new vice president of the student council. His mission? To dive into the world of PSO2, assess its impact on the student body, and report back to Rina. As Itsuki embarks on this unexpected journey, he's about to discover secrets hidden within the game that could change everything. Will this jack-of-all-trades rise to the challenge and master PSO2, or will the game prove to be more than he bargained for? Join Itsuki in Phantasy Star Online 2 The Animation to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
